item.description:
Have you ever wanted to make a change in your life but felt blocked? Well here is your chance to release that stuck energy.

EFT, or Emotional Freedom Technique, is a new twist on Traditional Chinese Medicine with a western psychology approach. Through gentle tapping, the energy patterns underlying negative emotions get addressed and corrected. And since most of our physical conditions, psychological problems, habits and behaviors are the result of an accumulation of negative emotions, having a tool to help eliminate said emotions can help durably sustain a higher vibration in alignment with what it is you wish to attract.

Guest; Lucie Monroe is an intuitive wellness coach who helps her clients create the life they want by removing the blocks they have to more health, wealth, happiness and harmonious relationships. From a background in engineering and several stints with other healing modalities she’s been refining her skill as an EFT professional since 2007.

As a certified EFT Expert specialized in pain management, relationship issues and emotional eating, Lucie will give an informed and interactive presentation teaching about several block busting techniques and demonstrating their use on conscious and unconscious limiting beliefs, self-sabotage and chronic disappointment patterns as well as the deep-seated fears that govern our choices in life.

Please Join us

 

with love & gratitude

Ellen, your Motivational Facilitator

617-750-4830

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: EFT (Emotional Freedom Technique) with Lucie Monroe
